body.name: KITMAL Under Cabinet Lights 2 Pack, 60-LED Dimmable Motion Sensor Light, 2000mAh Rechargeable 12-inch Wireless Counter Light, 3-Color Magnetic Closet Lights
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Tuesday, February 20 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Tomorrow, February 16. Order within 5 hrs 50 mins
features: 【3 Colors Modes Dimmable】0.39" THIN & LIGHTWEIGHT closet light adopts side-emitting technology, which can make the wireless under cabinet lights softer and not dazzling. 3 output color temperatures of cold light, positive white light, and warm light (7000K/5000K/3100K) and gradient brightness options to meet your needs in different scenarios. Such as ideal for the bedroom, baby room, closet, cabinet, corridor, workshop, basement, garage, stairwell, garage entrances pantry, and other places.

【3 Working Modes Adjustable】CONVENIENT & ENVIRONMENTALLY FRIENDLY motion sensor indoor light has a 3-mode switch which is On-Off-G to set it always ON, OFF, or Motion Sensor Mode. You can be used for reading, making up, camping, and as a flashlight or motion sensor light. Under G mode, infrared induction and motion detection with the PIR sensors on the under cabinet lights will automatically sense human motion within 16.5ft/360°range and shut off automatically after 10 seconds of no movement.

【60-LED Light Illuminable】BRIGHTER & EYE-CARING led lights with “60-LED” lamp beads adopt a new production process of emitting light on the side, refracted to the light guide plate through the reflector, and then evenly distributed on the lamp surface through the diffuser plate. Will not directly hurt your eyes and shines brighter, and wider, so this reading light looks more comfortable with soft lighting, making it perfect for reading, studying, and relaxing.

【Light Up Everywhere】EFFORTLESS INSTALLATION & CHARGING wireless light with magnet and 3M tapes(included) can stick on any ironwork or non-iron surface. Easily charged via the micro USB cable(included) and has an indicator to clearly show the charging status. After fully charged, it can last for about 15 hours when you make it (ON) mode and about 8 weeks under motion sensor(G) mode. (Depends on the frequency of use and the brightness). Easy to handle for elders or kids anytime and anywhere.

【2000mAh Rechargeable】LONG LASTING & PEACE OF MIND led lights, built-in 2000mAh high-capacity and high-quality rechargeable battery and come with a 1-year limited warranty for the whole machine, including what you get: 2 x cabinet lights, 2 x micro USB cables, 2 x adhesive magnet, 2 x iron sheet, 2 x 3M tapes, 1 x user manual. These energy-saving lights are perfect for illuminating all your dark closets and cabinets without electricity.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Ultra-thin Rechargeable Motion Sensor Lights Easy to Install, Wireless Cabinet Light Let's Make More Brightness, Provides a Necessary Choice for Lighting in Various Life Scenes.
Previous page Next page 1 Adjustable Temperature 2 Adjustable Brightness
Adjustable Working Modes with Energy Saving and Environmental

PIR Motion Sensor This motion sensor under cabinet light will auto illuminate within someone walks by about 16.5ft (5m, 360°), auto-off after about 10 seconds with no motion detected. If you keep moving within the sensing range, the light will keep on.
Previous page Next page USE IN MULTIPLE SCENARIOS 1 GARAGE 2 TRUNK 3 CAR REPAIRING

2000mAh Li-Polymer Battery Longer: With 2000mAh battery, this rechargeable closet light can last 8 weeks on motion sensor mode（depends on the frequency of use). Removable Light Convenient: Require no drilling or wire layout to cause damage. Decorate your home stress-free and enhance your quality of life. Button Functions Selectable: Modes and Color Temperture Adjustment —by the button, can switch between the three modes (On-Off-G) or the color temperture (0%-100%). Charging Status Understandable: The charging indicator is red when charging, turning into green when fully charged.

Can this strip light be placed on a refrigerator? From Customer Katrina: Yes, since it's magnetized it will stick to the refrigerator with no problem. Magnets are included with no additional purchases. It is the seller and the product that are considered from the customer's point of view. Does anyone know the difference between these under cabinet lights and similar looking lights? From Customer Adeliciasyd: Yes, the cabinet lights are longer than most and are of quality workmanship. Another to my surprise, there are three different color temperatures and three modes that can be selected according to my different needs. How do you feel about this lamp after using it? From Customer Naba : The cabinet lights have larger battery capacity, more LEDs, and longer life. More importantly, they can change color temp and adjust brightness. How long does the battery last after fully charged? From Customer Semie: I think it depends on how often you open the cabinet and if you leave it open for extended periods. The ones in the garage 1 month, the kitchen 2 weeks maybe more.As far as I know,this closet light built-in 2000mAh high-capacity. Is there a guaranty on these? From Seller kenaS: Yes. We will provide a 12-month service for every closet light we sell. If you encounter any problems during use, just feel free to mail us, and we will provide a satisfactory solution for you within 12 hours.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 1, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Bright even in the dark!
reviews.reviewText: I ordered these lights because there’s a part of my room that just doesn’t get enough light for me to work properly at my desk. Thankfully I found these rlly good motion lights to help me study and it works pretty well for its price- good enough to be the light for some of these photos! Things I’d highlight about the product are:* 2 charging cords! (one for each)* Surprisingly very bright but not too much* comes with helpful lengthy stick on magnets⭐️* Perfect way to save some electricity since it is rechargeable and motion reactive* Lights up dark areas like closets and bathrooms fairly well* Surprisingly far range in terms of the sensor(works better in the dark)* Simple instructions and little packaging wasteI also wanted to mention it works as a regular lamp if you intent to keep the light on for a long period of time as well~ It’s a shame a lot of the time people avoid products with few reviews because this one is actually worth it

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 2, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Super lightweight and slim, good motion sensing and plenty of light
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. Delivered 7/29/2023 and I’ve been playing with them for a few days now.When I first picked up the delivery box I thought for sure I had the wrong item, it felt much too light. With the box open I was reassured when I saw the packaging. I was totally shocked by the size and weight of these lights. I see that the dimensions are in one of the product photos and in the amazon listing details, but I must have missed both of these. The product photos make them look much larger. However, this is actually a plus. I found these to be quite bright given the size.There are a couple buttons on these lights:Power Button: Short Press: light turns on for a few seconds then back off. Long Press: Light turns on indefinitely.Color Temp Button: Short Press: cycles through three temperature settings (warm, neutral, cool) Long Press: Adjusts brightness up/down.(Check for my video showing the color temp and brightness selections)In my testing I found the sensitivity of the motion sensor to trigger once I am within about 5 feet of the sensor. The light turns off after 10 seconds. It is not extremely sensitive, so when I stood still in front of the light, it would turn off and I’d need to move a hand a bit to get it to turn back on.The light is nice, soft and uniform. I can’t see any individual LEDs. They have good diffusion between the lens and LEDs.In a dark room these put off a good amount of light. I jerry-rigged one in the bathroom for a night light and had to turn the brightness all the way down so it wouldn’t be blinding in the middle of the night. It worked really well for this usage.I charged one up all the way and took it to work with me so I could monitor it. I turned it on with a long press and the battery outlasted my patience. After about 3 hours it started to look like it might be dimming a bit. At 3/5 hours in it was definitely dimmed a bit, but still noticeable in the well lit office. By 5 hours in it was still on but I had to hold it under my desk in the dark to tell for sure it was still on. I thought it was a pretty great battery life, especially considering how lightweight it is.With as small and lightweight as these are, they will easily be able to go in a lot of useful spots with little mounting effort.Overall I am more impressed with these lights than I expected.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice light. Motion Sensing works!
reviews.reviewText: I really like this light and the motion sensor DOES work. I edited my review to correct this. The instructions should make it clear it must be darker to work. This might seem obvious to some but not everyone apparently knows this. I would bet most reviews that claim the motion didn’t work didn’t give it time to work. These lights are really nice and light weight. They put off a great deal of light. The different modes are very handy. It’s great they are also rechargeable. I orders another set and highly recommend. A perfect solution for under counter lighting needs.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars NO BATTERIES AND VERY BRIGHT
reviews.reviewText: I installed these in my closet that has no light. My husband gets up when it's still dark out and normally turns on the bedroom light in my eyes to see what he wants out of the closet. Now when he walks over to the closet...his light turns on and I'm still able to sleep for a bit longer! The best part? They recharge? I had another set that had batteries. I finally gave up because they didn't stay stuck anyways. These are a far better design. I should have cleaned the surface before I stuck the adhesive. One of these stuck and the other didn't but I put it back up with 2 sided tape and now it works just fine. I like that I can easily pull these down to charge them. They really do work great and the different light color is a nice feature too!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Junk. Motion sensing does not work
reviews.reviewText: It's light and the brightness is sufficient but it only works in on and off mode. motion detection does not work at all. Returning.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Overall pretty good little lights
reviews.reviewText: I bought these lights to put in my closets and they are exactly what I was looking for. With no outlets nearby, I debated between battery or rechargeable as both are inconvenient. I am pleasantly surprised at how easy these have been. They came with adhesive strips as expected but also optional magnets and metal plates. This way the lights can be easily taken down and recharged with no hassle. I’m also very pleased with the length of time they hold a charge as in the closets they’ve only needed a charge once every couple months. The only con I’ve found so far is that it does take several hours to fully charge each light. But since it’s so infrequently it’s not much of a problem. The motion sensing is pretty accurate and has decent range. The light doesn’t stay on too long after it stops detecting motion, perfect for areas where you’re just in and out. Overall I’m very happy with these lights and they’re a great choice!
